resources.string: This is a vision test. It will just take a few minutes. Click on the power button of your controller to start.

"Move the joystick left, right, up or down to position the circle in your field of view. Hold the trigger button and push the joystick up if you canâ€™t see anything or click on the trigger button to validate the position. "
"Push the joystick in the same direction as the E is facing, up, down, left or right. If you can no longer see, just click on the trigger button."
"well done now calibrate the low contrast test."
"Almost done, now calibrate the contrast sensitivity test"
"End of test. We will start SightPlus now"
"Good job! Your results have been recorded"
"your test results are different from the previous tests, please repeat the test in 2 hours."
